args: docker ps -a | grep mcp-dingding-v2 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r docker rm -f > /dev/null 2>&1; docker pull ghcr.io/wllcnm/mcp-dingding-v2:latest > /dev/null 2>&1; docker run -i --rm --name mcp-dingding-v2 -e DINGTALK_APP_KEY=你的AppKey -e DINGTALK_APP_SECRET=你的AppSecret ghcr.io/wllcnm/mcp-dingding-v2:latest
